https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kvSdpVClbQMyduaBMoHvVgLchkN.jpg An astonishing journey revealing the awesome power of the natural world. Over the course of one single day, we track the sun from the highest mountains to the remotest islands to exotic jungles. Earth: One Amazing Day
